title: Add deadline reminders, offline support, document upload UI, advanced filtering, and UI polish

requirements.text: Implement automatic deadline reminder notifications that trigger before task deadlines to prevent delays

quotes: automatically send reminders before deadlines to prevent delays

acceptanceCriteria: Users receive notifications for tasks approaching their deadline
Reminders are sent at appropriate intervals before the deadline
Notification system integrates with the existing task management backend

requirements.text: Add offline support with service worker for offline viewing and automatic syncing when internet is restored

quotes: support offline viewing with automatic syncing when internet is restored

acceptanceCriteria: App displays cached data when offline
Changes made offline are queued and synced automatically when connection is restored
User receives feedback about offline status and pending syncs

requirements.text: Build document upload UI with file picker and upload progress indicators for customer document management
acceptanceCriteria: File picker allows selecting documents to upload
Uploaded documents appear in the customer's document list
Support for common document formats (PDF, images, etc.)

requirements.text: Implement advanced dashboard filtering by panel company, kW size, and project stage to help with task planning

quotes: with these details visible on the dashboard and usable for filtering and task planning

acceptanceCriteria: Filter controls available on dashboard for panel company, kW size, and project stage
Dashboard updates dynamically based on selected filters
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously
Clear indication of active filters with ability to reset

requirements.text: Polish UI with responsive design improvements and loading states throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: All pages are fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Loading states display during data fetches and operations
Smooth transitions and consistent spacing across the interface
Mobile navigation is intuitive and touch-friendly

constraints: Maintain existing backend data structures and API contracts
Do not modify Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Advanced analytics or reporting beyond existing summary reports
Multi-user collaboration or role-based access control
